title: Red Friends
body:
Do riot members freely add random players?
This is something that just randomly crossed my mind.

Like do they go "Hey that guy was cool" and add them.
How did anybody meet there red friends?


plz tell me I want more friends :(

Its ok, solitude means no one can judge me XD

replies.body: MasterMirkinen added me. I have 1-2 other reds on my friends list but I'm pretty sure I added them.

Lol, so they just hit the accept button?
Man, riot must be very lonely XD

I don't know how they do it, though I've interacted with the two on my friends list not long before ending up with them there. Pretty sure I added Cochese after playing in a Riot vs Community match last year (one of the ascension ones) which could be why they accepted. Mirk added me not long after I'd spent some time discussion the announced RP changes in that thread to better explain to certain individuals what was actually happening (a bit more recent).
We need to have another OCE VS RIOT thing going on again, that was fun.

Quick lets complain until riot does it again.
Riot plz.
Perhaps we should try asking first.

Alright go make a forum post then asking for it.
Ima sit here, and shake my fist at some things.
that's actually a cool story on why they added you.
I displayed a resourcefulness on the boards and that was respected by various Rioters to the point that they added me.
Alright that seems to be the best story on "How I met Rito" so far.

Keep in mind, Rioters are people too.  I'm relatively sure the riot accounts are allowed to have friend lists just like the rest of us, and are able to maintain them however they see fit.

Some people freely add random players, others don't.  It's important to remember that Rioters are just like the rest of us but likely have significantly higher numbers of random people attempting to add them.  It can be tough to address all of those requests even if you want to, because of time constraints and the fact friend lists can only be 200 people.

Yeah I know, people are still people.
But the thought just came to me on how/why they add others.

Maybe because they think that person is chilled or funny.
What reds do is up to them.
I have two reds add; one was for an apology the other for a thank you.
you gotta be active in the community I guess. I have a few riots on my FL, some added me, I added some.
